long_description: From Lake Tahoe to Sequoia National Park,. Author: Julie Smith. Softcover; 256 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. The Countryman Press; copyright 2009. Hikes range in length from a 2 mi. ramble to a multiday backpacking trip, and provide something for hikers of all abilities. Overview chart at the front of the book makes it easy to choose a hike based on mileage, difficulty, duration and location. Each hike description includes a topographic map and at-a-glance information on mileage, difficulty rating, time, elevation and recommended USGS maps. Provides information on the geology, wildlife and history of the Sierras.
short_description: From Lake Tahoe to Sequoia National Park, 50 Hikes in the Sierra Nevada charts 50 spectacular hikes within striking distance of the major urban centers in California.
